name: convertReligionsToCatholic
rulesOne:
Switch to Catholic. If you control enough Catholic provinces (directly or through allies) to be among the top 2 Catholics (top 3 in 7-8 player games), switch your role to Saved Catholic, otherwise switched to the Damned Catholic role. The next Damned Protestant becomes Saved in your place. All other Catholics update their roles.

Lose all Faith dice.

If you do not have a Catholic province, flip one province to Catholic.

name: convertToProtestantism
rulesOne:
Switch to Protestant. If you are the either the first or second (or third in 7-8 player games) to convert to Protestantism this game, switch to Saved Protestant. Otherwise, switch to Damned Protestant. All Catholics update their roles as well.

Lose all Faith dice.

If you do not have a Protestant province, flip one province to Protestant.

name: releaseAlly
rulesOne: Release a province as a one province Principality. Place two Influence on it and take their control marker. The Principality does not begin as an Elector.
rulesTwo: You may also gift it adjacent, same religion provinces to gain 1 additional Influence per province.

name: conductDiplomacy
rulesOne: Pick a player and play the Diplomacy Game with them. Then, take any or all of your Influence and distribute it to Principality(ies) of your choice, regardless of their religion or allies.
rulesTwo: If you have equal or more Influence on the Principality than they have provinces and you have more Influence than any other player, ally the Principality and take its control marker, adding it to your board on the appropriate size slot. Other players do not displace you as ally until they surpass you in Influence.

name: foreignPower
rulesOne: Gain 4 Influence and place it all on one Principality of your choice.
rulesTwo: You must have only one province and no allies.

name: intercession
rulesOne:
Gain 3 Catholic Faith dice plus:

+1 Faith dice per 3 Catholic provinces you control (directly or through allies)
+1 if the Emperor is your religion
+1 if you are Saved
rulesTwo: Roll all of your Faith dice. Place every die you got a 1-3 on a province (following Faith dice placement rules) to begin converting it next Mass event. Discard the failed dice rolls.
rulesThree: You must be a post Council of Trent Catholic.

name: downWithTheWhore
rulesOne:
Gain 3 Protestant Faith dice plus:

+1 if the Emperor is your religion
+1 if you are Saved
rulesTwo: Roll all of your Faith dice. Place every die you got a 1-3 on a province (following Faith dice placement rules) to begin converting it next Mass event. Discard the failed dice rolls.

name: declareWarOnPlayer
rulesOne: Declare war on a player or prince. If you target a prince, remove all of your Influence with them. Immediately resolve the war.

name: declareReligiousWar
rulesOne: Declare a Religious War against a prince with a Religious Upheaval Marker on it and immediately resolve the Religous War.
